thread.title: SEBI directs Rising Agrotech to refund money collected from investors
thread.title_full: SEBI directs Rising Agrotech to refund money collected from investors

author: Moneylife Digital Team
title: SEBI directs Rising Agrotech to refund money collected from investors
text: Moneylife Â» SEBI directs Rising Agrotech to refund money collected from investors 43074 SEBI directs Rising Agrotech to refund money collected from investors 0 Comments, Be the first to comment The company was engaged in fund mobilizing activity through issuance of Preference Shares, to more than 49 persons, without complying with the relevant provisions of the Companies Act, 1956, according to a SEBI Order SEBI has passed an order on Rising Agrotech and its directors directing them to refund the money collected by the company through issuance of Preference Shares, with interest at the rate of 15% per annum compounded at half yearly intervals and also not to access the capital market. The company and its directors have also been restrained and prohibited from buying, selling or otherwise dealing in the securities market, from the date of this order till the expiry of four years from the date of completion of refunds to investors. The company was engaged in fund mobilizing activity through issuance of Preference Shares, to more than 49 persons, without complying with the relevant provisions of the Companies Act, 1956. SEBI had passed an interim order on September 09, 2014 whereby it directed the company and its promoters/directors not to collect any more money from investors. More in Moneylife
